source.name: The Griffon's Saddlebag: Book Two
source.author: Griffin Macaulay, Dom Prezio, Rose "GM" Whitcomb
source.artist: Willow Christensen Casper, Willow Christensen, Jayden Catron, Zachary Thorpe
source.description: A treasure trove of hundreds of new magic items and more for the 5th edition of the world's greatest roleplaying game
